comprehensive_overview: kmergenie is a software tool used for estimating the best k-mer length for genome de novo assembly. It analyzes the histogram of k-mer occurrences in the input reads and recommends the optimal k-mer length to use for assembly.
core_features: Estimates the optimal k-mer length for de novo genome assembly
Analyzes k-mer occurrence histograms from input reads
Helps avoid excessive memory usage and computational time in assembly processes
